attributes.action: allow Microsoft to market a UK upgrade release of Windows 7 to include Internet Explorer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The majority of UK users will download Inernet Explorer onto Windows 7 installations. Therefore, it seems unfair that Microsoft are 'forced' to sell the new operating system without IE and therefore without an upgrade from XP/Vista.

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
